name: OpenClaw
postCreateCommand: npm install -g openclaw && bash -lc 'for p in /project/openclaw/scripts/install-project-cli.sh /project/scripts/install-project-cli.sh /project-parent/openclaw/scripts/install-project-cli.sh; do if [ -f "$p" ]; then bash "$p"; exit $?; fi; done; echo "project-cli installer script not found" >&2; exit 1'
